alert.note: Alert for Defiance; Henry (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 9:20PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Defiance and Henry Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 920 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Defiance, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Defiance, Napoleon, Deshler, Holgate, Mcclure, Hamler, Malinta, Florida, Jewell, Gallup, Grelton, Brunersburg, Okolona, Elery and Standley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
